args.content:
import Mathlib

open Complex

variable {V : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup V] [InnerProductSpace ‚ÑÇ V] [FiniteDimensional ‚ÑÇ V]

/-- Exercise: A normal operator on a complex inner-product space is self-adjoint iff all its
    eigenvalues are real. -/
theorem Axler_exercise_7_9 (T : V ‚Üí‚Çó[‚ÑÇ] V)
  (h_normal : T.comp (LinearMap.adjoint T) = (LinearMap.adjoint T).comp T) :
  (T = LinearMap.adjoint T) ‚Üî
    ‚àÄ Œº : ‚ÑÇ, (‚àÉ v : V, v ‚â† 0 ‚àß T v = Œº ‚Ä¢ v) ‚Üí Œº.im = 0 :=
by sorry
